metadata.title: CVE-2022-31086 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: LDAP Account Manager (LAM) is a webfrontend for managing entries (e.g.users, groups, DHCP settings) stored in an LDAP directory. In versionsprior to 8.0 incorrect regular expressions allow to upload PHP scripts toconfig/templates/pdf. This vulnerability could lead to a Remote CodeExecution if the /config/templates/pdf/ directory is accessible for remoteusers. This is not a default configuration of LAM. This issue has beenfixed in version 8.0. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
